mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (github_id, name, full_name, html_url, description, stars, forks, watchers) VALUES (#{githubId}, #{name}, #{fullName}, #{htmlUrl}, #{description}, #{stars}, #{forks}, #{watchers})
mapper.update: UPDATE project SET name = #{name}, full_name = #{fullName}, html_url = #{htmlUrl}, description = #{description}, stars = #{stars}, forks = #{forks}, watchers = #{watchers} WHERE github_id = #{githubId}
